title: The Fabric of Complicity
desc: THE FABRIC OF COMPLICITY   is an art exhibition that presents iconic images found on paper money issued by the Confederate States of America that have been colorfully reproduced by the artist  JOHN JONES  and represented in his paint series, CONFEDERATE CURRENCY: THE COLOR OF MONEY. This highly colorful work is the artist?s interpretation to scale of propaganda images depicting forced labor meant to reinforce Southern convictions of slavery.?
